system.description:
Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.BpzqLw0tPg39wrUF]{Pilot}

Ready? Set? Go!

Qualities

  1. Whenever you would enter your personal vehicle you can equip this accessory as a free action

  2. While driving your personal vehicle without weapon modules you gain @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.character-inventory.adOwiuGCpZMhnZ6z]{Quick Draw}

  3. When you gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.HCzLtYgEWScIeJNq]{Heart in the Engine} and it deals extra damage with the result of the accuracy check being an even number your passenger can make a free HR0 attack against it.

  4. When the passenger of your vehicle would be targeted you can choose to be targeted instead
